Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Sad>If you wanna sell your clothing, you
should take it off first!<sp:5:1:0> Yeesh, they're
all wrinkled and everything.
Com_Talk_54:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>You don't have enough rupees!<sp:5:0:0> I can't
give you a lower price than this.
Com_Talk_55:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Sir, your pouch is full.<sp:5:0:0> Try tossing or
selling some of your stuff.
talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>President Yunobo asked me to start up
a <clr:0000>ruby shop<clr:ffff>, so I did.

But I don't care about rubies. I care about
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.
Com_Talk_00:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0000><clr:ffff><snd:Greeting>We've got a low-price guarantee here, and
we'll buy from you at the normal price—
that's the YunoboCo-store way!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Now that I think about it, I don't even
know why I gave such a hoot about
marbled rock roast.
President Yunobo went through the 
trouble of prepping this stall for me,
and I was letting it go to waste.
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I don't mean to disrespect President
Yunobo, but working at the <clr:0000>ruby shop<clr:ffff>
is a waste of time.
I don't care about rubies. I care about
<clr:0000>marbled rock roast<clr:ffff>.
Com_Talk_31:
<clr:0000><sp:3:0:2:0701><clr:ffff><snd:Greeting>Freshly harvested <clr:0000>rubies<clr:ffff>!<sp:5:0:0> How many will
you take?
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>YunoboCo stores can always offer<clr:0000> half
the normal price<clr:ffff>! Come again before we
sell out.
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for the business! We're always
just waitin' for you to come back.
Com_Talk_04: <sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS>Oh?<sp:5:0:0> I was ready to buy and everything...
talk0005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>From here on out, we've got a new
business approach—sell, sell, and sell
some more!
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>YunoboCo stores can always offer <clr:0000>half
the normal price<clr:ffff>!

We sell out quickly, just like now, so yer
best bet is to snap things up just as soon
as we get our stock back!
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You can only buy ore at these kind of
prices at YunoboCo stores!
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for the business! We'll
restock soon.
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Welcome to the ruby shop!<sp:5:1:0> We're open
for business again.
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>My precious stones go there—not yer
filthy feet!
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>President Yunobo asked me to start up
a new ruby shop.

But now's no time for work.<sp:5:1:0> All I've
got time for is this incredible <clr:0000>marbled
rock roast<clr:ffff>.
